name: Authorise (app)
Log oauth URL (user)
Paste access code (user)
Set access token
func:
console.log('BIM360 user access token:', msg.payload);

return msg;

name: Step 1.
info:
Generate the URL that you Application will make requests to perform the first leg of three-legged authentication.

Copy the [https://pasteboard.co/IBqsjWJ.png](code) value and prepare for step 2.

name: Step 2.
info:
Exchange the code for the access_token

In the .bl-config.json file, copy the `access_token` to the property "FORGE_ACCESS"  

This is the value that your application will send with future requests on behalf of this user.

name: Get hub
Log hub ID
List projects
Log projects
Get project Details
Get root folder Details
POST job
Get urn thumbnail
Get item Details
GET metadata (tbc)
GET manifest
Get buckets (2 legged)
Set Global
configurator
configurator
func:
var newmsg = {}

global.set("engine", msg.payload.engine)
global.set("bundleDescription", msg.payload["description"])
global.set("endpointURL", msg.payload.uploadParameters.endpointURL)
global.set("key", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData.key)
global.set("contentType", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData["content-type"])
global.set("policy", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData.policy)
global.set("successActionStatus", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData.success_action_status)
global.set("successActionRedirect",  msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData.success_action_redirect)
global.set("xAmzSignature", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData["x-amz-signature"])
global.set("xAmzCredential", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData["x-amz-credential"])
global.set("xAmzAlgorithm", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData["x-amz-algorithm"])
global.set("xAmzDate", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData["x-amz-date"])
global.set("xAmzServerSideEncryption", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData["x-amz-server-side-encryption"])
global.set("xAmzSecurityToken", msg.payload.uploadParameters.formData["x-amz-security-token"])

return newmsg;

name: Assign existing Alias to new AppBundle
Assign Existing Alias to New Version
configurator
func:
// Global Variables
global.set("activityId", "thisActivityIdDemo") // !! 
global.set("activityAliasId", "demo2") // !!
global.set("activityDescription", "the description of the activity")
global.set("bundleId", "test2") // !!
global.set("bundleAlias", "demo2") // !!
global.set("fullBundleId", "dublinAccelerator." + global.get("bundleId") + "+" + global.get("bundleAlias")) // !! 
global.set("activityDescription", "this activity will do stuff with bundle") 
global.set("outputFileName", "result") 
global.set("outputFileExtension", ".rvt") 
global.set("activityVersion", 1)
global.set("engine", "Autodesk.Revit+2018")

return msg;
